verses.verse: And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That there be some <S%G5100><s%> of them that stand <S%G2476><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall not taste <S%G1089><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> they have seen <S%G1492><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with power. <S%G1411><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> takes <S%G3880><s%> with him Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and James, <S%G2385><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> and leads <S%G399><s%> them up into <S%G1519><s%> an high <S%G5308><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> apart <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> by themselves: <S%G3441><s%> and he was transfigured <S%G3339><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them.

And his raiment <S%G2440><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> shining, <S%G4744><s%> exceeding <S%G3029><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as snow; <S%G5510><s%> so <S%G3634><s%> as no <S%G3756><s%> fuller <S%G1102><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> white <S%G3021><s%> them.
And there appeared <S%G3700><s%> to them Elias <S%G2243><s%> with Moses: <S%G3475><s%> and they were talking <S%G4814><s%> with Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G4461><s%> it is good <S%G2570><s%> for us to be here: <S%G5602><s%> and let us make <S%G4160><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> tabernacles; <S%G4633><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> for you, and one for Moses, <S%G3475><s%> and one for Elias. <S%G2243><s%>
For he knew <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G5101><s%> to say; <S%G2980><s%> for they were sore <S%G1630><s%> afraid. <S%G1630><s%>

And there was a cloud <S%G3507><s%> that overshadowed <S%G1982><s%> them: and a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> out of the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is my beloved <S%G27><s%> Son: <S%G5207><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> him.

And suddenly, <S%G1819><s%> when they had looked <S%G4017><s%> round <S%G4017><s%> about, <S%G4017><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> any <S%G3765><s%> more, <S%G3765><s%> save <S%G235><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> with themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

And as they came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> he charged <S%G1291><s%> them that they should tell <S%G1334><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> things they had seen, <S%G1492><s%> till <S%G1508><s%> <S%G3752><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> were risen <S%G450><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people, <S%G3793><s%> when they beheld <S%G1492><s%> him, were greatly <S%G1568><s%> amazed, <S%G1568><s%> and running <S%G4370><s%> to him saluted <S%G782><s%> him.

And wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> he takes <S%G2638><s%> him, he tears <S%G4486><s%> him: and he foams, <S%G875><s%> and gnashes <S%G5149><s%> with his teeth, <S%G3599><s%> and pines <S%G3583><s%> away: and I spoke <S%G2036><s%> to your disciples <S%G3101><s%> that they should cast <S%G1544><s%> him out; and they could <S%G2480><s%> not.

And they brought <S%G5342><s%> him to him: and when he saw <S%G1492><s%> him, straightway <S%G2112><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> tare <S%G4682><s%> him; and he fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground, <S%G1093><s%> and wallowed <S%G2947><s%> foaming. <S%G875><s%>

And he asked <S%G1905><s%> his father, <S%G3962><s%> How <S%G4214><s%> long <S%G4214><s%> is it ago since <S%G5613><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to him? And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Of a child. <S%G3812><s%>

And often <S%G4178><s%> it has cast <S%G906><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the fire, <S%G4442><s%> and into <S%G1519><s%> the waters, <S%G5204><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> him: but if you can <S%G1410><s%> do any <S%G1536><s%> thing, have compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us, and help <S%G997><s%> us.
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are possible <S%G1415><s%> to him that believes. <S%G4100><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of the child <S%G3813><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out, and said <S%G3004><s%> with tears, <S%G1144><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I believe; <S%G4100><s%> help <S%G997><s%> you my <S%G3450><s%> unbelief. <S%G570><s%>

But they understood <S%G50><s%> not that saying, <S%G4487><s%> and were afraid <S%G5399><s%> to ask <S%G1905><s%> him.

And he took <S%G2983><s%> a child, <S%G3813><s%> and set <S%G2476><s%> him in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of them: and when he had taken <S%G1723><s%> him in his arms, <S%G1723><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them,
